page.description: The A5_DESIGN_BITMAP() function displays the Create Global Bitmap dialog box, which allows you to import a bitmap from a file or paste it from the clipboard.

argument.name: bitmap_name
argument.description: The name of the bitmap. If blank, the bitmap can be set in the dialog. If not blank, the bitmap will use the specified name and cannot be changed.

discussion.p: This function opens the *[ui:Create Global Bitmap]* dialog. This dialog can be used to import a bitmap from the file system or the clipboard. The optional *[xb:bitmap_name]* parameter can be used to specify the name for the bitmap. If a name is specified, it cannot be altered in the *[ui:Create Global Bitmap]* dialog.
The imported bitmap can be found on the Code tab in the Control Panel.
